```py
>>> import numpy as np
>>> from scipy.special import itstruve0
>>> itstruve0(1.)
0.30109042670805547 
```

```py
>>> import matplotlib.pyplot as plt
>>> x = np.linspace(-20., 20., 1000)
>>> istruve0_values = itstruve0(x)
>>> fig, ax = plt.subplots()
>>> ax.plot(x, istruve0_values)
>>> ax.set_xlabel(r'$x$')
>>> ax.set_ylabel(r'$\int_0^{x}H_0(t)\,dt$')
>>> plt.show() 
```
